title: FFPE
subtitle: FFPE Tissue Proteomics Analysis
description: Extract high-quality proteomics data from formalin-fixed paraffin-embedded (FFPE) tissue samples. Leverage archived clinical samples to conduct disease mechanism and biomarker discovery research.

features.title: Archived Sample Utilization
features.description: Generate reliable proteomics data from FFPE blocks stored for years. Access vast clinical sample archives for retrospective studies.

features.title: Optimized Preprocessing
features.description: Specialized sample processing protocols that address FFPE-specific protein crosslinking challenges. Ensure maximum protein recovery and identification depth.

features.title: Clinical Research Support
features.description: Large-scale FFPE sample analysis for patient cohort studies, prognostic marker discovery, and treatment response prediction. Integration with histopathology data available.
